title: Chengzhang Zhe Dongxi season2
synopsis: He Xixi, a second-year girl, is a "female man" with a princess dream, kind-hearted and full of whimsy, while her brother He Dongdong who is in junior high school is a "quiet beautiful man". Both brothers and sisters go to school in "Dexin Academy". The play revolves around the siblings, parents, teachers and friends around them. Each episode is a short story from the perspective of the child's clear eyes and innocent soul, covering social, human relations, environmental protection, survival, belief and other issues from a small view, subtly popularizing the spiritual core of "love, beauty, and responsibility". (translated from iqiyi)
